document_data.name: ''Jansen Spectroscopes''
document_data.creator: [[Jan Jansen]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Jansen Spectroscopes''''', officially referred to as the '''''Jansen Brand  Micro–Macro Spectroscopes''''', was a unique set of [[:Category:Eyewear|glasses]] invented and worn by the 14{{th}} century [[gnome]] inventor [[Jan Jansen]]. They served as a type of [[optic aid]], giving Jan enhanced vision.
document_data.Description:
The spectroscopes featured a number of different lenses that were fashioned in an undeniably "stylish" manner.

They were considered to be the official spectroscopes of the [[Purple Brotherhood]].
document_data.Powers: The spectroscopes allowed Jan to better see through [[illusion]]s as well as uncover and disable harmful traps. Once per day, Jan could use the glasses to [[detect invisibility|freely see creatures or individuals that were rendered invisible]].
